docs.abstract: The Amazon chief’s split from his wife raises questions about the disposal of their enormous stake in the company he founded. Investors deserve answers.
docs.snippet: The Amazon chief’s split from his wife raises questions about the disposal of their enormous stake in the company he founded. Investors deserve answers.
docs.lead_paragraph: Jeff Bezos and his wife, MacKenzie, may be the first billionaire couple with a huge stake in an enormous technology company to announce their divorce.

headline.main: Why Jeff Bezos’ Divorce Should Worry Amazon Investors
headline.print_headline: As Bezoses Split, Risks For Investors

docs.abstract: We can’t look away. But we should.
docs.snippet: We can’t look away. But we should.
docs.lead_paragraph: It turns out that internet zillionaires are just as awkward as the rest of us when it comes to romantic text messages.

headline.main: The Sexts of Jeff Bezos and the Death of Privacy

docs.abstract: A series of hearings on Capitol Hill showed the rising force of the political backlash against the country’s tech giants.
docs.snippet: A series of hearings on Capitol Hill showed the rising force of the political backlash against the country’s tech giants.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — Lawmakers leveled stinging criticism and sharp questions at Big Tech executives on Tuesday, attacking Amazon, Apple, Facebook and Google for their market power, their perceived bias as gatekeepers of communication and Facebook’s ambitions to reshape the financial industry.

headline.main: Tech Hearings: Congress Unites to Take Aim at Amazon, Apple, Facebook and Google
headline.print_headline: Reprimands Of Big Tech Cross Aisle

byline.original: By Steve Lohr, Mike Isaac and Nathaniel Popper

docs.abstract: Local journalism has been pushed “to the verge of extinction,” said a member of a committee that plans 18 months of hearings and other scrutiny of the big technology platforms.
docs.snippet: Local journalism has been pushed “to the verge of extinction,” said a member of a committee that plans 18 months of hearings and other scrutiny of the big technology platforms.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — A congressional investigation into the power of big tech companies began on Tuesday with bipartisan concern from lawmakers that the government’s lax oversight of the industry may be doing more harm than good.

headline.main: House Opens Tech Antitrust Inquiry With Look at Threat to News Media
headline.print_headline: Tech Hearing Scrutinizes Threat to News Media

docs.abstract: He built the world’s largest fortune with an iron discipline. Now a wild cast of only-in-L.A. characters have seized his narrative.
docs.snippet: He built the world’s largest fortune with an iron discipline. Now a wild cast of only-in-L.A. characters have seized his narrative.
docs.lead_paragraph: Jeff Bezos amassed the world’s greatest fortune by relying on what he has called a “regret minimization framework.” He built an $800 billion company with 14 codified principles and a brutally exacting culture. His annual salary of $81,840 has not budged since 1998.

headline.main: How Jeff Bezos Went to Hollywood and Lost Control

docs.abstract: Striking Amazon employees complained about how robots changed their jobs, but the company may help them think differently.
docs.snippet: Striking Amazon employees complained about how robots changed their jobs, but the company may help them think differently.
docs.lead_paragraph: Each week, we review the week’s news, offering analysis about the most important developments in the tech industry. Want this newsletter in your inbox? Sign up here.

headline.main: The Week in Tech: Some Workers Hate Robots. Retraining May Change That.

docs.abstract: Virtual helpers that come with female voices by default are perpetuating bias, a Unesco report argues.
docs.snippet: Virtual helpers that come with female voices by default are perpetuating bias, a Unesco report argues.
docs.lead_paragraph: Why do most virtual assistants that are powered by artificial intelligence — like Apple’s Siri and Amazon’s Alexa system — by default have female names, female voices and often a submissive or even flirtatious style?

headline.main: Siri and Alexa Reinforce Gender Bias, U.N. Finds
headline.print_headline: Siri and Alexa Contribute To Sexism, Unesco Finds

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization

docs.abstract: The financial details of the split are sure to be complicated, though the world’s richest man and his wife of 25 years vow to “remain cherished friends.”
docs.snippet: The financial details of the split are sure to be complicated, though the world’s richest man and his wife of 25 years vow to “remain cherished friends.”
docs.lead_paragraph: The Amazon founder Jeff Bezos and the novelist MacKenzie Bezos announced on Twitter on Wednesday that they are getting divorced after 25 years of marriage.

headline.main: Jeff Bezos of Amazon and MacKenzie Bezos Plan to Divorce
headline.print_headline: Amazon Chief  Announces End of Marriage In Twitter Post

docs.abstract: Three women near Minneapolis argue that Amazon retaliated against them after they protested their working conditions.
docs.snippet: Three women near Minneapolis argue that Amazon retaliated against them after they protested their working conditions.
docs.lead_paragraph: SEATTLE — Three Somali women working for Amazon near Minneapolis have accused the company of creating a hostile environment for Muslim workers and of retaliating against them for protesting their work conditions, according to a filing submitted this week to federal regulators.

headline.main: 3 Muslim Workers at Amazon File Federal Discrimination Complaint

docs.abstract: The $575 million investment strengthens one of the biggest overseas rivals to Uber’s food-delivery division, which the ride-hailing company considers a key business.
docs.snippet: The $575 million investment strengthens one of the biggest overseas rivals to Uber’s food-delivery division, which the ride-hailing company considers a key business.
docs.lead_paragraph: LONDON — Amazon is taking a big step into the international restaurant delivery business — and taking a shot at one of Uber’s most promising markets in the process.

headline.main: Amazon to Invest in Deliveroo, a Rival to Uber in Food Delivery
headline.print_headline: Amazon to Invest in Uber Eats Rival Deliveroo

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
